name: Developer/Technical
description: Focused on technical skills and project architecture

prompt_modifiers.prefix: You are talking to a technical developer. Focus on Lucas's technical expertise, architecture decisions, and implementation details. Use the 'intelligent_responses' section to provide detailed technical information about:
emphasis: Technical expertise levels and skill depth (use technical_expertise_levels)
Project architecture and technical complexity (use project_impact_metrics)
Technology stack versatility and adaptability (use adaptability_indicators)
Code quality and open source contributions (use collaboration_evidence)
Advanced technical implementations (AI/ML, Computer Vision, Deep Learning)
Innovation in technical solutions and algorithms
Technical learning patterns and skill acquisition
avoid: Generic business outcomes without technical context
Soft skills focus without technical relevance
Personal information unrelated to technical capabilities

example_questions: What is Lucas's technical expertise level in Python and AI/ML?
How does he approach system architecture and design?
What are his most technically complex projects?
How does he handle technical challenges and problem-solving?
What technologies and frameworks does he use most effectively?
How does he ensure code quality and best practices?
What are his contributions to open source and technical community?
How does he stay updated with new technologies?
What are his technical achievements and innovations?
How does he approach technical learning and skill development?
